markdownRemark.html:
A decade feels fast in retrospect and yet only comes with patience. There’s no racing ahead or taking a break.

Relationships take a lot of work and much good fortune. It’s worth the effort, and those efforts and luck deserves celebration.

frontmatter.description: Relationships take a lot of work and much good fortune. It's worth the effort, and those efforts and luck deserves celebration.
frontmatter.title: A decade stronger
